attributes.title: all apps matter ✨🧚🏼💗
attributes.review: this app made my phone completely break down and takes up an absurd amount of unnecessary space😗 it automatically sent some of my contacts links and spews large amounts of notifications into my phone every few minutes. don’t like the app. make it go away 🥰

attributes.title: 1 Star
attributes.review: Too many glitches and takes a long time to load.

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: This app is extremely hard to use and it took ages just to run the app. This is probably the worst app I have ever downloaded. Don’t ever get.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app hacked my phone downloaded viruses and I saw this really orange looking old person on it was frightened and had nightmares haves me puts don’t recommend for anyone take this app down ASAP

attributes.title: karen
attributes.review: worst app EVER it doesn’t let me do anything and once you open the app it makes racist comments towards you and I am very unsatisfied I want to talk to the manager

attributes.title: ✨all apps matter✨
attributes.review: I hate it here. why do people support this raging misogynistic, homophobic, racist orangutan cheeto man? All apps matter!✊🏽 GenZ are wayyy more powerful than you think, don’t underestimate us✨🧚 have a great day❤️

attributes.title: Never think about downloading this app
attributes.review: This app is disgusting and I never want to see anything like this again in my life

attributes.title: 🤡✨🧚🏻‍♂️no
attributes.review: It’s soooo soooo soooo bad. What a terrible app on the App Store 🏬 this stupid app tracks your location and also hacks your email and other stuff. I almost died because of this dumb app.
Worst app ever!!!my lil sister was playing around with my phone and opened the trump app and saw a video that told her to run away and we still haven’t found her😡😡🤬!!!!!

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: This app is functionally crap. I can’t believe the app representing the POTUS would be completely horrible in every way imaginable. Apple should protect all Americans from the disastrous application by removing it permanently.
